Shivah/Kali:::

Shivah was ready to replied but a femenine voice said "I'm volunteer 
too"
Shivah Looked around and saw his sister Kali, she had heard most of 
the dialog. 

"I want to help Kitkat"said Kali.

"I'm not all agree"replied Shivah "we nees some intellingece and 
power... you and kitkat has a lot intelligence... but can you...?"

"Do you think that I'm weak?????"said Kali"I'm not... and you know 
it "

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit/KitKat2::
> 
> "I'm not sure. Most of our guys are rather aggressive," said 
DrillBit.
> 
> "I volenteer," chimed in KitKat.
